name: PRETAPES
description: We're seeing how word pyramid syntax crystals are evolving and taking on a new life of their own. In PRETAPES, we can clearly see this mandala concept beginning to take shape; once crude, now higher levels of complexity. Simple, yet complex...a minimalist's wet dream. But are we at the stage where we want to push this concept? Can it be pushed further? We've created a gradient within PRETAPES that gives the illusion of shading and/or slight depth. The "A"s in the middle of the star shape create a circle rich in angles, form, and structure. The mandala-esque shape gives off a sense of purpose and wisdom, as if to say it's been floating there for eons and must be an oracle for knowledge. Let's try another variation on this...
